en.av_c2: Compare the smallest values in each list.
en.av_c3: We will merge two sorted lists into one.
en.av_c4: First compare the smallest values in each list.
en.av_c5: The smaller value is 2 in the right list.
en.av_c6: Move it to position 0 of the output list.
en.av_c7: Continue in this way, at each step comparing the smallest values in each list.
